For you,
my everything.

A love story told in moments

In a world of fleeting moments,

you are my constant.

In a sea of faces,

yours is the one I search for.

You are not just someone I love—

you are the reason love makes sense to me.

Our Moments

December 24th, 2023 — The day everything changed

I love the way your eyes light up

when you talk about the things you're passionate about.

I love how you make me laugh

even on my darkest days.

I love the way you listen,

truly listen,

like my words are the only ones that matter.

I love how you make ordinary moments

feel extraordinary.

♥

Time moves differently when I'm with you.

Hours feel like minutes,

yet every second is etched in my memory.

You've taught me that love isn't just a feeling—

it's a choice I make every single day.

And I choose you.

Always.

I will love you
in every lifetime,
in every universe.

Thank you for being you.

Forever yours,

with all my heart.
